ing: 1 (8 ounce) container vanilla low fat yogurt
des: "Muy delicioso!  Very good if you want a quick and sweet snack.  And there is no need to use the oven, microwave, or stove! If you want, use whipped cream in place of the yogurt."
ins: Plop the peanut butter onto a plate. Cover it with vanilla yogurt. Place two chocolate chips onto the blob for 'eyes'. Stick pretzels into the blob for arms, legs or antennae. Sprinkle cinnamon sugar over the top.
